do_if.comment: clear ignore flag when ship should fight. e.g. v ship: when no shields, but good hull.
but orders that have kaait features acquire the code changes even if they are not used, so update ALL running orders

check_all.chance: if (not @$kAAITParam_iskAAITOrder) and (@$kAAITParam_isStepForwardWithdraw or (@$kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk and (not @this.assignedcontrolled.iscapitalship))) then 100 else 0
if (not @$kAAITParam_iskAAITOrder) and (@$kAAITParam_isStepForwardWithdraw or (@$kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk and (not @this.assignedcontrolled.iscapitalship))) then 100 else 0

set_value.name: $kAAIT_attacker
set_value.exact: if event.param.defensible then event.param.defensible else event.param

event_gravidar_has_scanned.object: if (@$kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk and (not @global.$kAAITByShipId.{'$' + @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode}.$attackData.$isIgnoreKAAIT)) then this.assignedcontrolled else null

check_all.comment: do not avoid attack targets. note that xssm ships avoid their targets NOT from this event but from code in their AI. this event is for targets that enter gravidar.

debug_text.text: @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' kAAIT_Handler_AvoidWithdrawOrJustFight $kAAIT_attacker is not the current target'

check_all.comment: is allowed to avoid or withdraw. conditions: attacker, self, situation

debug_text.text: @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' kAAIT_Handler_AvoidWithdrawOrJustFight attacker shield and hull are high'

check_all.comment: attacker is target and it has other lxl attacker

debug_text.text: @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' kAAIT_Handler_AvoidWithdrawOrJustFight has other attackers including me'
@this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' kAAIT_Handler_AvoidWithdrawOrJustFight has other attackers not including me'
@this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' kAAIT_Handler_AvoidWithdrawOrJustFight attacker is target and has other attackers'
@this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' kAAIT_Handler_AvoidWithdrawOrJustFight no operational weapons, ensure avoid behaviour'
@this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' kAAIT_Handler_AvoidWithdrawOrJustFight too few operational weapons, ensure avoid behaviour'
@this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' kAAIT_Handler_AvoidWithdrawOrJustFight poor shields (le skill-withdraw) v station'

check_all.comment: good shields: fight. poor shields: withdraw

check_value.comment: at this point, $kAAIT_distAttacker is distance from $kAAIT_attacker

debug_text.text: @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' kAAIT_Handler_AvoidWithdrawOrJustFight poor shields (le skill-withdraw) v ship'

do_if.comment: assumes this is already in an attack run_script set in order.fight.attack.object

do_else.comment: assumes in any other order with this handler

do_if.comment: do not get attack target unless: (1) fighter and (2) has operational weapons
not avoiding target but look for big enemies nearby and avoid any found

check_all.chance: if @$kAAITParam_iskAAITOrder or @$kAAITParam_isStepForwardWithdraw or (@$kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk and (not @this.assignedcontrolled.iscapitalship)) then 100 else 0
if @$kAAITParam_iskAAITOrder or @$kAAITParam_isStepForwardWithdraw or (@$kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk and (not @this.assignedcontrolled.iscapitalship)) then 100 else 0
if @$kAAITParam_iskAAITOrder or @$kAAITParam_isStepForwardWithdraw or (@$kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk and (not @this.assignedcontrolled.iscapitalship)) then 100 else 0

check_any.comment: new target needs to be bigger or old target is a station

check_value.comment: new target is bigger than current target
new LXL target is more dangerous than current station target

check_any.comment: current order is not attack or is of different target
next order is not attack or is of different target

check_value.comment: too many attack orders if there's already a 3rd attack order

set_value.name: $kAAIT_is_attack_order_tactical
set_value.exact: ( event.name == 'event_player_alert' or ( event.name == 'event_object_signalled' and event.param == 'kncpr_enemy_report' ) ) and $kAAIT_target_attack.iscapitalship and this.assignedcontrolled.bboxdistanceto.{$kAAIT_target_attack} gt this.assignedcontrolled.maxradarrange * 0.5

check_all.chance: if @$kAAITParam_iskAAITOrder or @$kAAITParam_isStepForwardWithdraw or (@$kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk and (not @this.assignedcontrolled.iscapitalship)) then 100 else 0
if @$kAAITParam_iskAAITOrder or @$kAAITParam_isStepForwardWithdraw or (@$kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk and (not @this.assignedcontrolled.iscapitalship)) then 100 else 0

check_all.comment: moved away from recorded target position

do_if.comment: other big enemy nearby, release all from tactical order and just attack

do_else.comment: release self from tactical order and attack new

do_elseif.comment: release all from tactical order and just attack
release all from tactical order and just attack

check_all.chance: if @$kAAITParam_iskAAITOrder or @$kAAITParam_isStepForwardWithdraw or (@$kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk and (not @this.assignedcontrolled.iscapitalship)) then 100 else 0

set_value.name: $kAAIT_isTakeRisk
set_value.exact: this.assignedcontrolled.primarypurpose == purpose.fight and ( (not $kAAIT_isHighRisk) or ( (not $kAAIT_test_target_isTakeRisk.isclass.station) and (not $kAAIT_test_target_isTakeRisk.isclass.ship) ) or ( $kAAIT_test_target_isTakeRisk.isclass.station and ( this.assignedcontrolled.weapons.all.count and this.assignedcontrolled.weapons.operational.count / (this.assignedcontrolled.weapons.all.count)f gt 0.25 ) and $kAAIT_isShieldsLow_vsStation and ( @this.assignedcontrolled.iscapitalship or ( this.assignedcontrolled.dps.missiles.all and this.assignedcontrolled.ammostorage.missile.count ) ) ) or ( @$kAAIT_test_target_isTakeRisk.iscapitalship and ( this.assignedcontrolled.weapons.all.count and this.assignedcontrolled.weapons.operational.count / (this.assignedcontrolled.weapons.all.count)f gt 0.25 ) and ( $kAAIT_isShieldsLow_vsShip or this.assignedcontrolled.bboxdistanceto.{$kAAIT_test_target_isTakeRisk} gt this.assignedcontrolled.maxradarrange * 0.25 or ( this.assignedcontrolled.shieldpercentage le 5 and this.assignedcontrolled.hullpercentage le 50 ) ) ) )
set_value.comment: v station: lxl or missiles + shields ok + weapons ok, v ship: shields ok + weapons ok

set_value.name: $kAAIT_isAvoidEnabled
$kAAIT_isWithdrawStepForwardEnabled

actions.name: kAAIT_GetIsTargetHighRisk
actions.comment: also update 'get is avoid or withdraw now' conditions in different handlers

set_value.name: $kAAIT_isTargetPotentialHighRisk
set_value.exact: $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.dps.all and ( $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.station or ( $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.size gt this.assignedcontrolled.size * 1.5 and $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.primarypurpose == purpose.fight ) or this.assignedcontrolled.type == shiptype.carrier )

set_value.name: $kAAIT_result_isTargetHighRisk
set_value.exact: $kAAIT_isTargetPotentialHighRisk and ( ( $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.station or this.assignedcontrolled.hullpercentage le 25 ) or ( @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.hullpercentage lt 1 and @$kAAIT_target_highRiskEntity.$kAAIT_attackers_lxl.count ) or ( ( this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.[class.ship_xs, class.ship_s] or this.assignedcontrolled.primarypurpose != purpose.fight ) and @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.ship and @$kAAIT_target_highRiskEntity.$kAAIT_attackers.count * global.$kAAITByShipId.{'$' + @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode}.$attackData.$skill_attackers_count_mult le $kAAIT_gunCount * global.$kAAIT_Data.$xss_outnumberVShips / 100.0 ) or ( ( this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.[class.ship_xs, class.ship_s] or this.assignedcontrolled.primarypurpose != purpose.fight ) and @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.station and @$kAAIT_target_highRiskEntity.$kAAIT_attackers.count * global.$kAAITByShipId.{'$' + @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode}.$attackData.$skill_attackers_count_mult le $kAAIT_gunCount * global.$kAAIT_Data.$xss_outnumberVStations / 100.0 ) or ( this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.ship_m and @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.ship and @$kAAIT_target_highRiskEntity.$kAAIT_attackers.count * global.$kAAITByShipId.{'$' + @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode}.$attackData.$skill_attackers_count_mult le $kAAIT_gunCount * global.$kAAIT_Data.$m_outnumberVShips / 100.0 ) or ( this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.ship_m and @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.station and @$kAAIT_target_highRiskEntity.$kAAIT_attackers.count * global.$kAAITByShipId.{'$' + @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode}.$attackData.$skill_attackers_count_mult le $kAAIT_gunCount * global.$kAAIT_Data.$m_outnumberVStations / 100.0 ) )

set_value.name: $kAAIT_isTargetPotentialHighRisk
set_value.exact: $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.dps.all and ( $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.iscapitalship or $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.station or ( $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.size gt this.assignedcontrolled.size * 1.5 and $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.primarypurpose == purpose.fight ) or this.assignedcontrolled.type == shiptype.carrier )

set_value.name: $kAAIT_result_isTargetHighRisk
set_value.exact: $kAAIT_isTargetPotentialHighRisk and ( this.assignedcontrolled.primarypurpose != purpose.fight or $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.dps.all gt this.assignedcontrolled.dps.all * 1.25 )

do_if.value: this.assignedcontrolled.dps.all and this.assignedcontrolled.primarypurpose == purpose.fight and ( (not @global.$kAAITByShipId.{'$' + @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode}.$attackData.$attackOrder_smallTarget.exists) or (not global.$kAAITByShipId.{'$' + @this.assignedcontrolled.idcode}.$attackData.$attackOrder_smallTarget.$primarytarget.isoperational) )

actions.name: kAAIT_GetSkillVars
actions.comment: also update 'get is avoid or withdraw now' conditions in different handlers

do_if.comment: at this point this is in same sector as ship

set_value.name: $kAAIT_yaw_from
set_value.comment: ensure that resulting yaw is away from yaw_from

set_value.name: $kAAIT_yaw_from
set_value.comment: ensure that resulting yaw is away from yaw_from

actions.name: kAAIT_CheckDefaultOrderOfCommander
actions.comment: in the base game, the replacement commander doesn't acquire the previous commander's default order. this leaves all subordinates to be dumb - sometimes only responding to threads after they've attacked.

do_if.comment: invalid escort order, restore if an order was saved

actions.name: kAAIT_RestoreDefaultOrderOfCommander
actions.comment: in the base game, the replacement commander doesn't acquire the previous commander's default order. this leaves all subordinates to be dumb - sometimes only responding to threads after they've attacked.

do_if.comment: invalid escort order, restore if an order was saved

do_if.value: (this.assignedcontrolled.hullpercentage gt 25) or ( this.assignedcontrolled.hullpercentage lt 50 and this.assignedcontrolled.shieldpercentage lt 25 )

actions.name: GetAvoidPosVectorAndObject
actions.comment: avoid pos = average pos of target and big enemies, avoid yaw = 'average' yaw from target and big enemies to ship

do_if.comment: this new vector is too wide from other vectors, consider avoiding this object as well
do not get first because $kAAIT_result_yaw_avoidFrom already been set above
if TacticalOrder, cancel it. then re-add it.
